mapper.select: SELECT * FROM psychology_base.department ORDER BY update_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psychology_base.department (id, name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version) VALUES (#{department.id}, #{department.name}, #{department.createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{department.updateBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE psychology_base.department SET name = #{department.name}, update_by = #{department.updateBy}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), version = #{department.version} + 1 WHERE id = #{department.id} AND version = #{department.version}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM psychology_base.department WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
